title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Adoption Strategies for Design Principles in Scalable Faculty Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of educational program development
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply visual design principles (contrast, alignment, repetition, proximity) with 80% or higher accuracy when designing educational materials.
Learners can analyze the needs of a target group using mixed methods (surveys and interviews) and develop educational content reflecting the results.
Learners can identify practical barriers to applying design principles, establish task prioritization strategies, and achieve an application rate of 60% or higher.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
